projects: KYC (Know Your Customer) identity verification service internalization

projects: Led entire frontend from design to release as project maintainer

details.overview: Built real-time communication-based fiat-crypto trading system between users
process: Set feature-based sprint cycles, operated continuous feedback-based development process

security: Integrated various authentication options: Passkey, phone verification, OTP, email, Security Key

socket: Improved connection stability through ping-pong mechanism redesign
Implemented reconnection logic using window online/offline, document visibilitychange events

Minimized server load by removing unnecessary polling and introducing SSE
ux: Implemented dark mode and color theme
Web accessibility and RTL/LTR support for internationalization

Achieved FCP under 1 second per page (Lighthouse)
Structural improvements to minimize Layout Shift (using Suspense, Skeleton UI)
seo: Increased search engine index from ~8K to ~38K pages (4x+ growth)
Documented workflows for non-developers to understand

spot.title: SPOT Exchange Migration
spot.description: Full migration from 7-year qooxdoo legacy to React to resolve rising maintenance costs and feature development delays

detail.overview: Fully migrated ProBit Global's core SPOT trading platform from a 7-year-old qooxdoo-based legacy system to a modern React + TypeScript architecture. Maintained complex trading functionalities including real-time price data, order systems, and charts while significantly improving developer productivity and user experience.
tasks: Optimized WebSocket-based real-time price/order book data processing and implemented reconnection logic
Established server state management and caching strategies using Tanstack Query
Designed and implemented dark mode and custom color theme system
Integrated and customized TradingView chart library
Implemented real-time order book data-based Depth Chart
Improved order form UX and implemented real-time validation logic
Implemented Mobile responsive layout and Simple/Pro mode switching feature

p2p.title: P2P Trading Service
p2p.description: Designed and built real-time P2P trading platform for business expansion and competitive positioning
achievements: Led entire frontend from design to release

detail.overview: Led the entire frontend development from design to release for a P2P trading platform enabling direct fiat and cryptocurrency transactions between users. Built a secure and reliable trading environment through real-time communication and multi-factor authentication systems.
tasks: Established and applied Next.js-based SSR/ISR rendering strategies
Designed multi-communication architecture using WebSocket, SSE, and Axios
Developed entire frontend for ad creation/management, trading
Real-time chat feature (Sendbird)
Designed and implemented multi-factor 2FA system including Passkey and OTP
Designed UI/UX for trade status management and dispute resolution

kyc.title: KYC Identity Verification
kyc.description: Self-developed identity verification service using AWS Rekognition
achievements: Applied AI tools for structure and design

detail.overview: Internalized the identity verification system that previously relied on external KYC solutions (Sumsub) using AWS Rekognition and Amplify Liveness. Actively utilized AI tools to improve development efficiency and designed a user-friendly verification flow.
tasks: Implemented facial recognition authentication using AWS Rekognition Face Liveness
Developed ID card capture and OCR data extraction process
Planned and implemented 3-step verification flow [Identity verification → ID upload → Real-time face recognition and comparison]
Implemented session persistence and authentication flow across Infrastructure - Backend - Frontend
Introduced AI-based development workflow using Claude Code and Figma MCP

eazel.title: Eazel Web Service Renewal
eazel.description: Complete renewal from vanilla JS to Next.js to resolve tech debt and improve performance

detail.overview: Led the major tech stack transition in the complete renewal of Eazel's global art platform web service. Significantly improved search exposure and user experience through SEO optimization and performance improvements.
tasks: Transitioned entire service architecture to Next.js
Improved code stability and developer productivity by introducing TypeScript
Implemented real-time chat functionality using WebSocket
Community system implementation (comments, likes, follow system)
Built payment system with Stripe SDK integration
Provided art price and trend analysis UI using highChart.js
Increased search index by 475% through SEO optimization
Achieved FCP under 1 second through performance optimization

my-agentic-ai.title: Review Sentiment Analysis Agent AI
my-agentic-ai.description: Agent AI service for review text sentiment analysis using Google Gemini and Claude API

detail.overview: An Agent AI service that analyzes review text sentiment and automatically generates appropriate responses using Google Gemini and Claude API. Built based on the 'AWS Agentic AI Review Management Automation' seminar from AWSKRUG.
tasks: Implemented review text input and sentiment analysis
Auto-response generation using AI models (Gemini, Claude)
Built design-based code auto-generation workflow using Figma MCP
Implemented responsive UI with shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS

my-liveness.title: AWS Rekognition Face Liveness Demo
my-liveness.description: Face Liveness authentication demo application using AWS Rekognition and Amplify
features: Real-time face recognition and Liveness verification

detail.overview: A demo application for testing and learning AWS Rekognition Face Liveness feature. Developed to pre-validate AWS service integration methods before the company's KYC project.
tasks: AWS Amplify setup and Rekognition Face Liveness integration
Real-time camera stream processing and face recognition implementation
Liveness verification result handling and UI feedback
Input data validation using Zod

my-tanstack-query-strategy.title: TanStack Query v5 Strategy Guide
my-tanstack-query-strategy.description: Comparative analysis of three data fetching strategies (CSR, SSR, Streaming) with TanStack Query in Next.js App Router
features: CSR vs SSR vs Streaming strategy comparison

detail.overview: A strategy guide and example project for effectively utilizing TanStack Query v5 in Next.js App Router environment. Documented the working principles and selection criteria for three data fetching strategies: CSR, SSR+Hydration, and Streaming.
tasks: QueryClient server/client separation pattern implementation
Comparative analysis of CSR, SSR+Hydration, Streaming strategies
useQuery vs useSuspenseQuery selection criteria documentation
Server cache transfer pattern implementation using HydrationBoundary

my-monorepo.title: Local Weather Service
my-monorepo.description: Weather service built with pnpm + Turborepo-based monorepo structure

detail.overview: A learning and practice project for monorepo structure using Turborepo. Designed with multiple applications based on Next.js and Vite sharing a common UI package. Learned monorepo web deployment process through Vercel.
tasks: Monorepo structure design using Turborepo
Common UI component package (@repo/ui) implementation
Next.js web application and Vite-based app implementation
Weather API integration and real-time information display
